website_summaries.verdict: With 30 puzzles included in one brain teaser bundle, you'll stay busy for weeks trying to solve the many enigmas this set contains.
pros: Set your own difficulty level with the different teasers available in this set
Whether you're a teen or adult, this game keeps your mind sharp and helps develop strategic thinking
cons: Small pieces can present a choking hazard to little children
Can become frustrating if you lose any pieces

customer_reviews.title: Fun time-passer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5th grade class to use once they’d finished an assignment, to keep their brains active instead of doing something mindless. They absolutely love them! I do wish, however, that the instructions were a bit more clear, as I am having a hard time reassembling some of them after they’ve been solved. This is leading to pieces being lost.
customer_reviews.author: Devyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Some are cheap quality but overall good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to jazz up Christmas presents by tying one to the ribbon on each present for the family and kids and attaching to envelopes that held otherwise boring cards and gift cards. They were a big hit!! We have many fun photos of family members lined up on the couch face down trying to solve their given puzzle. The memories are worth the price of admission. Ultimately, they were not all very hard or very great quality but some were better than others. Given the number of puzzles included, it is well worth the cost. Fun will be had!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z.

customer_reviews.title: Cool puzzles but solution sheet is very vague
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for family entertainment over Christmas. They functioned as expected, but the kids (and a few adults) didn't put them back together before putting them back in the bucket. The instructions aren't very helpful. We also have a few of the larger ones that have gotten partially solved and I don't know where they are in the solution, and the manual again is too vague to be helpful. Love the toys, they're perfect, but I really wish that solution page was more descriptive!
customer_reviews.author: MissE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stocking Stuffers!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as stocking stuffers for our kids. All the puzzles have a decent quality to them. Most have been solved by the kids (8, 12,12) and the harder ones have been solved by dad. Does come with "instructions" but they are kinda confusing to figure out. Getting the puzzles put back together is sometimes more of a challenge then getting them apart! Lol
customer_reviews.author: H. Frank

customer_reviews.title: As expected but one orange snap lock is missing
customer_reviews.text: Received in good time, the product is as expected. However, one orange snap lock on the box was missing, so the handle is useless. The reason I bought it was because it came with a storage case, & my son can take places with him. Now I'll probably have to go out and buy a new case so he can travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: D & H Quin

customer_reviews.title: bad materials
customer_reviews.text: for the price given, i kinda understand substandard metals, but im a smaller person, i shouldnt be able to accidentally force the puzzles if i dont break the rule:: they should slide apart easily. idk. great puzzles. a whole bucket of classics actually. but they are soft metal. very very soft. tossed one in the air and it dropped on the side of my composite desk coating, it left a scratch and dent larger then a thrown full can of *soda* will be dented when whooped at my buddies head.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Pile of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to give to the kids for a long plane flight. They liked it and are still working on a few of the puzzles.I withheld one star because the quality could be a little better. That said, the puzzles range from super easy to moderately hard. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sub

customer_reviews.title: Good value for large pack of different puzzles
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, these were fine. There were a couple put together incorrectly or that just came apart without any puzzling, but most were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Great for Party Favors
customer_reviews.text: Left these out on the guest tables during our wedding reception. Bought 80+ different ones, came back with maybe 10? I think it's safe to say they were a total hit!
customer_reviews.author: Becka Brisbin

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for my 26 year old girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: She loves puzzles and she loved these she solved all of them in about an 1hour. The hardest ones aren’t too difficult. We still break them out and try to solve them as fast as we can and have fun doing it.
customer_reviews.author: OneEpicMuffin

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to get a break from the tablet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter found one of these puzzles at a friend's house and couldn't put it down. Love to see her challenging herself with these compared to playing on her tablet or watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: TQ

customer_reviews.title: A great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as Christmas gifts for grandchildren challenging and NOT electronic,
customer_reviews.author: John Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Packaged so well, arrived on-time,
customer_reviews.text: These are cute. They are a gift for my child for this Christmas. What I have seen of them is just wonderful and I know my boy so I know he will enjoy each and every one of these. Durable. Arrived on time. Packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Cassette J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband enjoys these so much. Got them as a valentine's present.
customer_reviews.author: Deni C

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied even with a malfunction.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this gift for my son for Christmas. He has ADHD and fidgets with his hands all the time. Hoping this will help him and at the same time make is smart brain grow bigger. However the box it came in was missing a handle to keep the box securely closed. I'm sure it wouldnt have lasted long anyways. Overall I am satisfied with this product and the delivery speed in which it came.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey R.

customer_reviews.title: Good collection of metal brain teaser toys
customer_reviews.text: Overall not bad at all for the price paid. Each one is individually bagged so you don't mix the parts up. I wished the carry case was a little thicker, plastic is a little thin.
customer_reviews.author: CI

customer_reviews.title: Just what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Made a wonderful Christmas gift for my grandson he loves a Challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unable to solve all puzzles.
customer_reviews.text: Not enough information on how to solve all the puzzles.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Schantz

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a kids gift
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These are metal so will hold up. Still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: tbalke2012

customer_reviews.title: birthday gift for 13 yo grandson
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a bit pricey, but our grandson really liked them. I guess that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son-in-law and he enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Myers

customer_reviews.title: They're mostly the same
customer_reviews.text: These are not 30 distinct puzzles. There are a few and then one type is repeated with slight differences in size and shape. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cory C.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again if needed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these for Christmas. Great value glad it came with the bag as our plastic box was broke on delivery
customer_reviews.author: JBuck

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Best family entertainment... try your best not to look at the answers
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: It would be ok for young kids
customer_reviews.text: To many of them are the same thing for getting a part. once you figure one or two out over half of them are easy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I like how they ate individually wrapped as well. They ate hoping into Easter eggs.
customer_reviews.author: H. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Family loved
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for family that likes to challenge their mind!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lampe

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are very small. I like the puzzles but I think I would have preferred fewer puzzles that were larger and sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept for a game set
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a friend. Nice concept for a game set, but I was disappointed in the actual product size/dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Lots of FUN
customer_reviews.text: This item was awesome!! The puzzles were fun and challenging with a good range from easier up to almost diabolical. My son is 10 and we ended up giving some of these out as birthday party favors. His friends loved them also. I would highly reccomend!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Caveny

customer_reviews.title: Challenging
customer_reviews.text: I had a set like this when I was a child and since then I wanted to find one for my kids. These are a great challenge for them and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Speyer

customer_reviews.title: Me and my kids had lots of fun with this some wherr hard but some where super ...
customer_reviews.text: Me and my kids had lots of fun with this some wherr hard but some where super easy. And it come with the manual on how to take them part of there to hard.
customer_reviews.author: ruth

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a way to show you how to put them back together once solved, but fun little brain teasers! Some are very difficult!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Table Favors
customer_reviews.text: These were used for table favors for an event I planned for work at our Science Center. They worked well for what I needed them for. They are small in size, but that is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: TERESA

customer_reviews.title: good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Case came damaged. Some puzzles are very hared and the directions are hard to understand. Otherwise, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Martin

customer_reviews.title: A few good ones
customer_reviews.text: A lot of them are either too easy or too complicated. Theres some real bangers in here but several you'll know how to solve before it leaves the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Oillut

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: A little on the small side but the kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and some are pretty challenging. This will keep kids entertained for a while.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: keeping boys busy
customer_reviews.text: got these for my grandchildren ages 11 to 16.they had a ball with them.
customer_reviews.author: gary w gilley

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen it, shipped to my dad out of state.
customer_reviews.author: angel mcallister

customer_reviews.title: No "Instructions" in the box
customer_reviews.text: In the product description and all over the product details page there is a mention of "Instructions" included - it is missed. I received only box, bag and metal teasers. No "Instructions". The quality of images on product details page is very low to substitute actual "Instructions" and to help with teasers.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: It could have been good...I think. But it came with no carrier bag and no info sheet as described. The tote was also cracked and broken.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReviewing

product_meta.title: LOOBANI Assorted Brain Teasers Metal Wire IQ Puzzles with Plastic Box Package Great Educational Intelligence Toys for Adult Children and Student Expanding Mind 1 Set 30Pcs
product_meta.description:
Edition:30 in 1This puzzle has a history of almost two thousand years. Are you ready to solve it? Disentangling those pieces without bending or cutting the wires to win the game. More pieces, higher difficulty. Do not miss it 

About the Product 
A disentanglement puzzle is a type of mechanical puzzle that involves disentangling one piece or set of pieces from another piece or set of pieces. The reverse problem of reassembling the puzzle can be as hard as—or even harder than—disentanglement. There are several different kinds of disentanglement puzzles, though a single puzzle may incorporate several of these features. 

Plate-and-ring puzzles 
A plate-and-ring puzzle usually consists of three pieces: 
*one plate or similar displaying many holes and/or indentations 
*a closed or nearly closed ring or a similar item. 

Wire puzzles 
Wire puzzles consist of two or more entangled pieces of more or less stiff wire. The pieces may or may not be closed loops. The closed pieces might be simple rings or have more complex shapes. Normally the puzzle must be solved by disentangling the two pieces without bending or cutting the wires. Early wire puzzles were made from horseshoes and similar material. 

Wire-and-string puzzles 
Wire-and-string puzzles usually consist of: 
*one piece of string, ribbon or similar, which may form a closed loop or which may have other pieces like balls fixed to its end. 
*one or several pieces of stiff wire 
*sometimes additional pieces like wooden ball through which the string is threaded. 
One can distinguish three subgroups of wire-and-string puzzles: 
*Closed string subgroup 
*Unclosed loose string subgroup 
*Unclosed fixed string subgroup 
-by Wikipedia 

Product Content 
1 x Set of products(including 30pcs) 
1 x Plastic box 
1 x Instruction
feature_bullets: A good puzzle to keep your mind sharp
This puzzle has a history of almost two thousand years. Are you ready to solve it?
30 different styles metal brain teasers in 1 box. Having 30 pieces spreads the difficulty throughout the kit providing a good amount of fun and challenge!

It is such a great classic game that never gets old! Teasers rank from fairly simple to difficult. An amazing intelligence game to develop thinking and manipulative ability. Designed for children, teens, students and adults (Small parts. Not for children under 6 yrs).

Try this new strategy game in your spare time to save your eyes from harm of electronic product's display. Linked together these wire pieces and do come apart with the right strategy. Patience is a virtue.

Metal teasers come with plastic storage bin and all of them are individually wrapped with opp bags. Non-woven bag is included for storing the teasers conveniently; Instructions are also included to explain the solution for each one.

The metal teasers are made of 70# HCS (High-Carbon Steel) to provide high strength and toughness properties; LEAD-FREE. Smooth edges avoid hand injuries and nickel plating finish is stainless. They will be bright as new after a long time use.
